meanings.definition: A person who is devoted to fashion and clothing trends.
meanings.sent1: The fashionistas in the city always wear the latest styles.
meanings.sent2: Fashionistas enjoy shopping for new clothes and accessories.
meanings.sent3: The fashionistas had a fun time trying on different outfits at the store.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like a fashionista in a sea of plain dressers.
meanings.sent5: The fashionistas' outfits were like colorful paintings come to life.

meanings.sent1: Many fashionistas attended the fashion show together.
meanings.sent2: The group of fashionistas walked confidently down the runway.
meanings.sent3: The fashionistas giggled as they shared fashion tips with each other.
meanings.sent4: The fashionistas shone brightly under the runway lights.
meanings.sent5: The fashionistas' presence at the event was undeniable.
